column4: My laptop's fan starts spinning every 30 seconds and then keeps spinning for 10 seconds (on Ubuntu) and then goes off  - Is this normal?
whack a temperature monitor on your panel (right click panel > add > drag on a temperature sensor)
ok I'll try that, ikonia: I am not sure if 50C is normal?
I could not find a temperature sensors among my Gnome Panel applets? Any other suggestions?
